## NotificationMessageCss interface

Css classes for default notification message

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NotificationMessageCss 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clickable](./notifications.notificationmessagecss.clickable.md) | <code>string</code> | Css class that is applied to div when you can close message by clicking on it |
|  [messageDiv](./notifications.notificationmessagecss.messagediv.md) | <code>string</code> | Css always applied to message div |
|  [messageTypePrefix](./notifications.notificationmessagecss.messagetypeprefix.md) | <code>string</code> | Prefix of css class applied to message div, suffix is according NotificationType |
